summary: This is a cinematic adaptation of the autobiography of Anna Wimschneider. It depicts her life's experiences and workaday routines as a woman born on a farm in lower Bavaria, Germany, in the... See full summary »
cast: Dana Vávrová|Werner Stocker|Claude-Oliver Rudolph|Eva Mattes|Ilona Mayer|Herta Schwarz|Renate Grosser|Julius Mitterer|Albert Wimschneider|Marie Bardischewski|Werner Schnitzer|Klára Lidová|Waltraud Ludwig|Karel Hermánek|Hans Schuler|Tonja Noss|Birge Schade|Alfons Scharf|Philipp Moog|Hannes Andersen|Joachim Schweizer|Stephan Glaser|Georg Hackl|Anton Feicht|Renate Muhri|Elisabeth Zissler|Engelbert Fuchsgruber|Rosa Schaetzel|Ferdinand Schuster|Berta Fuchsgruber|Leo Speer|Edeltraud Pichel|Eric Bichlmeier|Andreas Bucher|Josef Greiler|Lorenz Hartwig|Marco Klinger|Sascha Luebecke|Alexander Noneder|Miriam Gramelsberger|Sebastian Pollozek|Dominik Sikora|Florian Griebel|Janina Vilsmaier|Ferdinand Gratz|Tobias Gratz|Anna Wimschneider
title: Leche de otoño
